patthana20.1:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana20.1:3.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana20.1:4.1.pli: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.1:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.1:7.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.1:8.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.1:9.1.pli: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.1:10.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.1:11.1.pli: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahetukadukasadisaṃ.)

patthana20.1:12.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.1:13.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.1:15.1.pli: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.1:17.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.1:18.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.2:1.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:3.1.pli: Naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:5.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana20.2:6.1.pli: Nasanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana20.2:7.1.pli: Nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:8.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke …pe… magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.2:9.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana20.2:10.1.pli: Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana20.2:11.1.pli: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:12.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.2:13.1.pli: Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:14.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.2:15.1.pli: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana20.2:16.1.pli: Nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana20.2:17.1.pli: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1.) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.2:18.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.2:19.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.3:1.1.pli: Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.3:2.1.pli: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.3:3.1.pli: Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.3:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:10.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:11.1.pli: Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:12.1.pli: Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:13.1.pli: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:14.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:15.1.pli: Nasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:16.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:17.1.pli: Nasappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:18.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:19.1.pli: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:20.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:21.1.pli: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:22.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:23.1.pli: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:24.1.pli: Nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:25.1.pli: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:26.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:27.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:28.1.pli: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:29.1.pli: Nakāmāvacarañca nanakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:30.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:31.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:32.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana20.8:33.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:34.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.8:35.1.pli: Napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:36.1.pli: Naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana20.8:37.1.pli: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:38.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.8:39.1.pli: Naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana20.8:40.1.pli: Naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:41.1.pli: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:42.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.8:43.1.pli: Naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana20.8:44.1.pli: Naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:45.1.pli: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:46.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.8:47.1.pli: Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro ca anuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:48.1.pli: Naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana20.8:49.1.pli: Nasauttarañca naanuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.8:50.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.9:1.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana20.9:2.1.pli: Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.9:3.1.pli: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.9:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana20.9:5.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.9:6.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.

patthana20.9:8.1.pli: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana20.9:9.1.pli: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana20.9:10.1.pli: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.

patthana20.9:11.1.pli: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.9:12.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.

patthana20.9:13.1.pli: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana20.9:14.1.pli: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta …pe… nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri …pe… noavigate cattāri.

patthana20.9:15.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana21.1:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.1:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.1:4.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naabyākatañca nanahetuṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.1:5.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.11:1.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.11:2.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.11:3.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.12:1.1.pli: Nasaññojanaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.12:3.1.pli: Naganthaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.12:5.1.pli: Naoghaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ogho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.12:7.1.pli: Nayogaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā yogo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.12:9.1.pli: Nanīvaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.12:11.1.pli: Naparāmāsaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:1.1.pli: Nasārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.13:2.1.pli: Nasārammaṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.13:3.1.pli: Naanārammaṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.13:4.1.pli: Nocittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:5.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Naakusale tīṇi. Naabyākate tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:6.1.pli: Nacetasikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:8.1.pli: Nacittasampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:10.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:12.1.pli: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:14.1.pli: Nacittasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:16.1.pli: Nacittānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:18.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:20.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:22.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:24.1.pli: Naajjhattikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:26.1.pli: Nanoupādā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.13:28.1.pli: Naanupādinnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.14:1.1.pli: Naupādānaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.15:1.1.pli: Nakilesaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
